summary: Layout implementation matches spec. All components, hooks, and pages are correctly implemented with proper @/ path aliases, data-testid attributes, and correct types. Test files will be created in Phase 3.

acceptance_criteria.reason: SCENARIOS constant has all 8 scenarios and Sidebar component maps over them correctly
NavLink uses isActive to apply 'bg-bitcoin/10 text-bitcoin' styling
Mobile menu button triggers setSidebarOpen(true), close button triggers onClose()
Overlay div has onClick={onClose} to close sidebar when clicked

acceptance_criteria.criterion: External links open in new tab
acceptance_criteria.reason: Both faucet and SDK docs links have target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'
Mobile header uses lg:hidden, sidebar uses responsive translate-x classes
All 8 pages use React.lazy() and are wrapped in Suspense with PageLoader fallback
All 8 routes are defined in App.tsx matching SCENARIOS paths
Test files to be created in Phase 3 (unit tests phase)
